quotes.quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it's safe or certain.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: If you do what you always did, you will get what you always got.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Successful entrepreneurs are givers and not takers of positive energy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Whenever you see a successful person you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
quotes.author: Vaibhav Shah

quotes.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.
If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You can do anything, but not everything.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you donâ€™t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Focus is about saying no.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahathma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
